instruction: Could you help me to sort the records accoring to the amounts ascendingly?

minimal: `MOUSE_DOWN` on the first table cell of all the cells containing the records you want to sort.
`DRAG_TO`  on the last table cell of all the cells containing the records you want to sort.
`CLICK` 'Sort by' dropdown in the Sort window.
`CLICK` on the index to select the column containing the amounts from the dropdown.
